thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of Hotel Elysees Union, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Teresita H
title: Good location
text:
In good location, close to arc de triomp and champs elysees. Friendly staff. Room small but very clean. Breakfast ok. would recommend the place and would go back again. Got the metro from Charles de Gaulle airport for â‚¬10
Room Tip: We stayed at room 011 no bathtub only wet room. Don't know about other rooms See more room tips
